link.title: Clarke County Public Schools

div.a: SCHOOL COUNSELING, MENTAL HEALTH, AND OTHER RESOURCES

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The Clarke County School Board will meet on Monday, April 27, 2020 at 6:30 p.m. in the multi-purpose room of the School Administration Office. The agenda and supporting documents are now available on BoardDocs.
In order to abide by the recommendations for public gatherings amid the COVID-19 pandemic-

ul.li: The meeting is open to the public; however, no more than 10 people are allowed in the room at one time, including Board Members and staff.
An additional 10 people may watch the meeting on a TV monitor in the lobby.
Citizens may submit comments in advance to Superintendent Dr. Chuck Bishop at bishopc@clarke.k12.va.us

div.p: Comments received before the meeting will be read aloud and entered into the public record.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: By order of the Governor of the Commonwealth of Virginia, all public schools are closed through the end of the year.

div.p: Please visit our websites to email the appropriate staff member or call the office to leave a message.

h3.div: During the school closure, the CCPS Food Service Department will offer a meal pickup service to anyone 18 years of age or under. You may pick up 7 breakfast meals and 7 lunch meals free of charge. The meal service pickup will be at Clarke County High School Entrance U and Boyce Elementary School parking lot between 10AM-2PM on Tuesdays from March 31 - June 2.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-EehZO jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Together, as a community, we guide and nurture learning for all by encouraging, inspiring, and empowering.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

p.strong: Clarke County Public Schools aims to foster a community of continuous learners and problem solvers. We motivate metacognitive decision-making across content areas through a wide array of engaging lessons and multimedia instruction.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-zQtlcf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Kindergarten Registration is open. Please use this link to register:

p.strong: If you have any problems with this link, please send an email to weirr@clarke.k12.va.us.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

ul.li: Kindergarten Registration begins March 16 - this will take place even though schools are closed.
